unnormalised: A minor fire broke out at the Income Tax office on 12/07/2024, located at 14, Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Road, Pune, Maharashtra, 411001. Preliminary reports suggest an electrical short circuit sparked the blaze in the records room around 11:30 AM IST. Thankfully, no casualties were reported.
normalised: A minor fire broke out at the Income Tax office on twelfth july two thousand and twenty four, located at fourteen, Doctor Babasaheb Ambedkar Road, Pune, Maharashtra, four hundred and eleven thousand and one. Preliminary reports suggest an electrical short circuit sparked the blaze in the records room around eleven thirty A-M I-S-T. Thankfully, no casualties were reported.

unnormalised: Firefighters from the Pune Municipal Corporation, HQ address being, Fire Brigade Station, Near Saras Baug, Pune, 411009, quickly responded, managing to contain the fire within 2 hours. A significant number of files, however, were reportedly damaged. The extent of the damage is still being assessed by officials.
normalised: Firefighters from the Pune Municipal Corporation, H-Q address being, Fire Brigade Station, Near Saras Baug, Pune, four hundred and eleven thousand and nine, quickly responded, managing to contain the fire within two hours. A significant number of files, however, were reportedly damaged. The extent of the damage is still being assessed by officials.

unnormalised: "We received a call at approximately 11:40 AM and dispatched four fire tenders immediately," said Mr. Patil, the Chief Fire Officer, Pune Fire Department. "The prompt response prevented the fire from spreading to other parts of the building." The PMCs official website lists the main office address as PMC Bhavan, Shivajinagar, Pune - 411005.
normalised: "We received a call at approximately eleven forty A-M and dispatched four fire tenders immediately," said Mister Patil, the Chief Fire Officer, Pune Fire Department. "The prompt response prevented the fire from spreading to other parts of the building." The P-M-Cs official website lists the main office address as P-M-C Bhavan, Shivajinagar, Pune - four hundred and eleven thousand and five.

unnormalised: The incident has caused some disruption to the daily operations of the Income Tax office. The Commissioner's office, located at the same address – 14, Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Road, Pune, Maharashtra, 411001 – issued a statement assuring the public that all efforts are being made to restore normalcy as soon as possible. Inquiries can be made at the alternate email id, help@incometax.gov.in.
normalised: The incident has caused some disruption to the daily operations of the Income Tax office. The Commissioner's office, located at the same address – fourteen, Doctor Babasaheb Ambedkar Road, Pune, Maharashtra, four hundred and eleven thousand and one – issued a statement assuring the public that all efforts are being made to restore normalcy as soon as possible. Inquiries can be made at the alternate email id, help at incometax dot gov dot in.

unnormalised: The investigation into the cause of the fire is ongoing. Authorities from the Electrical Inspectorate, with their central office located at 701, A Wing, New Administrative Building, Mantralaya, Mumbai, 400032, have been called in to assist with the investigation. A detailed report is expected within the next few days.
normalised: The investigation into the cause of the fire is ongoing. Authorities from the Electrical Inspectorate, with their central office located at seven hundred and one, A Wing, New Administrative Building, Mantralaya, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and thirty two, have been called in to assist with the investigation. A detailed report is expected within the next few days.
